name: react-motion
description: A spring that solves your animation problems.

scripts.prepublish: rm -rf lib && babel src --out-dir lib && flow-copy-source -v src lib && webpack --config webpack.prod.config.js
scripts.gh-pages: git fetch origin && git checkout gh-pages && git reset --hard origin/gh-pages && git rebase origin/master --force-rebase && npm run build-demos && git add . && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push origin gh-pages --force && git checkout master

author: nkbt
chenglou
